alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 11:12AM MST until January 25 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Surfaces are expected to become icy and slick especially near and after sunset. * WHERE...Shoup, Bannock Pass, Highway 28 Tendoy to Lone Pine, Highway 93 Lost Trail Pass to Gibbonsville, Lemhi Pass, and Salmon. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lemhi County; Western Lemhi County
